titles.title: A bill to increase the clarity and predictability of the process for developing applications for Rx-to-nonprescription switches.
A bill to increase the clarity and predictability of the process for developing applications for Rx-to-nonprescription switches.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
